title: Privacy Policy
sections.introduction.title: Introduction
sections.introduction.content: FindClass.nz ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website and use our services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.
sections.dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
sections.dataCollection.content: We may collect information that you provide directly to us, as well as information collected automatically when you use our services:
sections.dataCollection.item1: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number) when you register for an account
sections.dataCollection.item2: Profile information (photo, bio, teaching qualifications) for tutors
sections.dataCollection.item3: Course information, reviews, and communications you post on our platform
sections.dataCollection.item4: Usage data and analytics about how you interact with our services
sections.dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
sections.dataUsage.item1: To provide, maintain, and improve our educational platform services
sections.dataUsage.item2: To create and manage your account, and process your registrations
sections.dataUsage.item3: To communicate with you about updates, security alerts, and support messages
sections.dataUsage.item4: To personalize your experience and provide recommendations for courses and tutors
sections.dataSharing.title: Sharing Your Information
sections.dataSharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:
sections.dataSharing.item1: With service providers who perform services on our behalf (hosting, analytics, payment processing)
sections.dataSharing.item2: To comply with legal obligations or respond to lawful requests from authorities
sections.dataSharing.item3: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as a business asset
sections.dataSecurity.title: Data Security
sections.dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
sections.userRights.title: Your Privacy Rights
sections.userRights.content: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
sections.userRights.item1: Right to access - You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you
sections.userRights.item2: Right to rectification - You can request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
sections.userRights.item3: Right to erasure - You can request deletion of your personal data in certain circumstances
sections.userRights.item4: Right to object - You can object to the processing of your personal data for marketing purposes
sections.cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
sections.cookies.content: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your browsing activities. You can control cookies through your browser settings. For more information, please see our Cookie Policy.
sections.children.title: Children's Privacy
sections.children.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have collected information from a child, please contact us immediately.
sections.changes.title: Changes to This Policy
sections.changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date at the top of this policy.
